name: Saundra Rose Maley
bio:
Saundra Rose Maley is the author of the poetry collection Disappearing Act (Dryad Press, 2015) and the academic book Solitary Apprenticeship: James Wright and German Poetry (Edwin Mellen Press, 1996). Her poems have appeared in Beltway Poetry Quarterly and Dryad, among other journals, and the anthology Full Moon on K Street: Poems about Washington, D.C. (Plan B Press, 2009). With Anne Wright, she coedited A Wild Perfection: The Selected Letters of James Wright (2005) and a forthcoming book about Wright and translation, Where the Treasure Lies.
She teaches at Montgomery College in Takoma Park, Maryland.
